languages.text: Вокс с записями переговоров повстанцев позволит начать масштабную разведывательную операцию. Необходимо вернуться на борт, чтобы задействовать ресурсы корабля.

traits.locale_text: Собранных данных достаточно для начала разведывательной операции.

languages.text: A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.
languages.original_text: Вокс с записями переговоров повстанцев позволит начать масштабную разведывательную операцию. Необходимо вернуться на борт, чтобы задействовать ресурсы корабля.

traits.locale_text: A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

languages.text: 行商浪人找到了一个音阵装置，里面有叛军士兵对话的录音。有了这个线索，便可以发起大规模的搜查行动。行商浪人需要回到船上，指挥虚空舰参与搜查行动。
languages.original_text: A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人找到了一个音阵装置，里面有叛军士兵对话的录音。有了这个线索，便可以发起大规模的搜查行动。行商浪人需要回到船上，指挥虚空舰参与搜查行动。

languages.text: 反乱軍の会話が録音されたヴォクスがあれば、大規模な偵察活動を始められる。自由開拓者は船に戻って、船内システムを捜索に参加させる必要がある。
languages.original_text: A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍の会話が録音されたヴォクスがあれば、大規模な偵察活動を始められる。自由開拓者は船に戻って、船内システムを捜索に参加させる必要がある。

languages.text: Un voco con grabaciones de las conversaciones de los rebeldes permitiría organizar una operación de reconocimiento a gran escala. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe volver a la nave para poder utilizar sus sistemas durante la búsqueda.
languages.original_text: A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

traits.locale_text: Un voco con grabaciones de las conversaciones de los rebeldes permitiría organizar una operación de reconocimiento a gran escala. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe volver a la nave para poder utilizar sus sistemas durante la búsqueda.

languages.text: Ein Vox mit Aufzeichnungen der Gespräche der Rebellen ermöglicht eine groß angelegte Aufklärungsoperation. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss im Rahmen der Suche zum Schiff zurückkehren, um dessen Systeme zu aktivieren.
languages.original_text: A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

traits.locale_text: Ein Vox mit Aufzeichnungen der Gespräche der Rebellen ermöglicht eine groß angelegte Aufklärungsoperation. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss im rahmen der Suche zum Schiff zurückkehren, um dessen Systeme zu aktivieren.

languages.text: Un vox des enregistrements des conversations des rebelles permettra de lancer une opération de reconnaissance à grande échelle. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit retourner au vaisseau pour mener les recherches avec ses systèmes.
languages.original_text: A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

traits.locale_text: Un vox des enregistrements des conversations des rebelles permettra de lancer une opération de reconnaissance à grande échelle. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit retourner au vaisseau pour mener les recherches avec ses systèmes.

languages.text: İsyancıların konuşma kayıtlarını içeren bir voks, büyük çaplı bir keşif operasyonu başlatılabilmesini mümkün kılacaktır. Hür Tacir, arama sürecinde sistemlerinden faydalanmak üzere gemiye dönmeli.
languages.original_text: A vox with recordings of the rebels' conversations will make it possible to launch a large-scale reconnaissance operation. The Rogue Trader must return to the ship to engage its systems in the search.

traits.locale_text: İsyancıların konuşma kayıtlarını içeren bir voks, büyük çaplı bir keşif operasyonu başlatılabilmesini mümkün kılacaktır. Hür Tacir gemiye dönerek arama sistemlerini kullanmalı.
